definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Main transmission system in machine-tool can be divided into two types: regular and irregular speed-change.
sentences.chinese: 機牀主傳動系統有常規變速和非常規變速兩種。

sentences.english: The driving system is an important part of twin-screw extruder.
sentences.chinese: 傳動系統是雙螺桿擠出機的一個重要部分。

sentences.english: Mainly discussed the technical development of the driving system with high torque twin screw extruder.
sentences.chinese: 着重論述了高扭矩雙螺桿擠出機傳動系統的技術發展。

sentences.english: This forms the basis of an Atkinson-cycle-based hybrid electric drivetrain.
sentences.chinese: 這形成了一個阿特金森基礎週期的混合電力傳動系統。

sentences.english: Leader in drive systems for off- highway and industrial applications.
sentences.chinese: 非公路用途和工業用途傳動系統領域的領導者。

sentences.english: Lightnin reducer allows you to change the seal without removing gear driver.
sentences.chinese: 維修和更換密封不需要移動萊寧的齒輪箱傳動系統。

sentences.english: The speed-difference control is critical for the automation of paper-making machines' sectional drive system.
sentences.chinese: 速差控制是紙機分部傳動系統自動化的關鍵。

sentences.english: The transmission system is in type of DC motor full-digital speed adjusting.
sentences.chinese: 傳動系統採用直流電機全數字式調速。

sentences.english: For repairing the transmission system we have to make disassembly to some parts of the lathe .
sentences.chinese: 要對這臺車牀傳動系統進行維修，必須拆卸某些部件。

sentences.english: The paper outlines development history of structure and power transmission system for aircraft towing tractor.
sentences.chinese: 論述了飛機牽引車的結構和動力傳動系統的發展歷程。

sentences.english: Then, the system constitution, drive form, and control strategy of shaft-less transmission were analyzed and studied.
sentences.chinese: 無軸傳動爲印刷設備傳動系統提供了新的解決方案。

sentences.english: Finally, the author studies the grinding gear setting and designs the drive system of machine tool.
sentences.chinese: 最後研究了磨齒裝置，設計了磨齒機的傳動系統。

sentences.english: The future development direction of diesel railcar transmission system is pointed out.
sentences.chinese: 指出了今後內燃動車傳動系統的開發方向。

sentences.english: The serpentine belt drive system since has been published receives the widespread attention.
sentences.chinese: 平帶傳動系統自問世以來就受到廣泛關注。

sentences.english: The biggest change in the driveline is the diff.
sentences.chinese: 最大的變化，在傳動系統是差異。

sentences.english: This driving system can be used in any working condition.
sentences.chinese: 本傳動系統在各種作業條件下均可以使用。

pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3

definition: radiator (for heating a room)/radiator (for cooling an engine)
